trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lake Placid
There were no other sightings in Lake Placid on or around February 4th 1941
Summary: Saw lights over Lake Placid for about an hour and a half
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were sitting on a screened in back porch fri night the 16th of march. I said, "What is that?" She said, "What"? Those light over the city I said. She immediatly got cold bumps all over and said, "O David, what are they?" I do not know but lets watch. We watched together for about an hour and were fasinated by these strange lights. They would appear one at a time in a straight row, 1st one, then another about a 1000 feet in front of the other. Usually three at a time and as many as seven. Also they would appear in two's very far apart, as much as 15 miles within seconds. I watched them another half hour. Watched the next night, nothing.
